publications.name: AliGATr: Graph-based layout generation for form understanding
publications.summary: Forms constitute a large portion of layout-rich documents that convey information through key-value pairs. In this paper, we present AliGATr, a graph-based model that uses a generative objective to represent complex grid-like layouts that are often found in forms. Using a grid-based graph topology, our model learns to generate the layout of each page token by token in a data efficient manner.
